name: Cute White Elephant - Fun Reflex Game from the makers of Growing Pug
name_original: Cute White Elephant - Fun Reflex Game from the makers of Growing Pug
description:
There's trouble in the Savannah! Tap animals as they stampede but whatever happens, Don't Touch the White Elephant!

How to Play
+ Tap all the animals that come across the screen, but Don't Touch the White Elephant
+ Don't miss any animals

This game will test your reflexes and quick thinking. How many animals can you tap before you touch the White Elephant?
